text: @jeffsessions @realDonaldTrump @JoeBiden Yeah, which part was that again?  Care to give us some of your favorite masterful quotes from the night? Was it the one where he talked for ten minutes about walking down a ramp? Or was it when he referred to Covid-19 as "Kung flu"?  So many masterful quotes to choose from...
